ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: its ripe fruit hanging close to hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: With fruits hanging low within reach,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: the clusters of whose fruit will be hanging low to be within reach (of the inmates of Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The fruit clusters of which are hanging down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The fruits in bunches whereof will be low and near at hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The fruits of which are near at hand:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Whereof the clusters are in easy reach.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: with clusters of fruit within easy reach.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Clusters whereof shall be near at hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: whose clusters [of fruits] will be within easy reach.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Fruits whereof (will hang in bunches) low and near.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The fruits in bunches whereof will be low and near at hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Its [fruit] to be picked hanging near.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:23] whose clusters, whose fruits, are in easy reach, nearby, reached [easily] by one who may be standing, or sitting or reclining.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Whereof the clusters) its fruits (are in easy reach) are very close, such that anyone sitting or standing can reach to them.
